Package com.gcep.data

Class RecipesDataService

java.lang.Object
com.gcep.data.RecipesDataService
All Implemented Interfaces:
RecipesDataServiceInterface
@Repository public class RecipesDataService extends Object implements RecipesDataServiceInterface
Provides the necessary operations for recipe information.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gabriel Cepleanu

    • searchRecipesByListItems

      public List<RecipeModel> searchRecipesByListItems(List<ListItemModel> listItems, boolean noItems)
      Description copied from interface: RecipesDataServiceInterface
      Returns a list of recipes that contain the item ids from list_item_ids. Custom items are not supported. list_item_ids should contain the primary keys for list items
      Specified by:
      searchRecipesByListItems in interface RecipesDataServiceInterface
      Returns:
      List of Recipe objects

      Returns:
      Status
